pkgmetadata.longdescription: Create Virtual Species for Species Distribution Modelling // A software package help user to create virtual species for species distribution modelling. It includes several methods to help user to create virtual species distribution map. Those maps can be used for Species Distribution Modelling (SDM) study. SDM use environmental data for sites of occurrence of a species to predict all the sites where the environmental conditions are suitable for the species to persist, and may be expected to occur.
